PS=

Sorry, I really should check the translation by online language tools more=
 carefully...
In regard of Rintaro's family register, Okita Rintaro is list=
ed as being the the ELDESTson of 
the Okita family and Okita Mistu is liste=
d as being the the ELDEST daughter of Kondo 
Shusuke.


> Some of the ways =
I've found to read that name are "Fusamasa",
> "Kanemasa", "Nobumasa", or "=
Nobutada". However, given what you have
> said regarding Souji's formal nam=
e being read "Kaneyoshi", it may make
> better logical sense for this man's=
 name to be read "Kanemasa".
> 
> Thank you for the additional information,=
 as well.
> 
> -M.
